title: 生存做小镇，用什么材料铺地板好呢？
author: YoungRB
txt_content: 石头？混凝土？石砖？平滑石头？还是什么呢？好烦恼啊。

replies.author: SQwatermark
replies.txt_content: 石头圆石苔石混合，几种沙石混合，石砖和苔石砖裂石砖混合(总之混合就对了)

replies.author: dashuzhi
replies.txt_content: 信标，又亮又好看

replies.author: 十二十二的
replies.txt_content: 全混搭起来好看鸭
园石最好看qwq

replies.author: kingking53
replies.txt_content: 平滑石头好看

replies.author: 小孩孩
replies.txt_content:
草方块，最原生态、最自然
而且耗费小

replies.author: tamashii
replies.txt_content: 是外屋的地板还是里屋的地板？

replies.author: SufferingA
replies.txt_content: 这个貌似要看你是什么风格的小镇吧。。

replies.author: YoungRB
replies.txt_content:
tamashii 发表于 2019-7-24 09:01
是外屋的地板还是里屋的地板？
室外的地板

replies.author: 20031116lu
replies.txt_content: 草方块铲子拍，村庄那种路，省材料又明显

replies.author: wzh123123
replies.txt_content: 完全混搭就可以

replies.author: Awei_阿威
replies.txt_content: 如果是室内的建议用白桦木

replies.author: 咕哒染桑QwQ
replies.txt_content: 因地制宜最好2333

replies.author: xianren66
replies.txt_content: 我喜欢木板的

replies.author: 乀呵呵~~~
replies.txt_content: 草地

replies.author: tamashii
replies.txt_content:
YoungRB 发表于 2019-7-24 09:24
室外的地板
建议用沙砾或者混合路面：50%沙砾 30%安山岩 20%圆石

replies.author: Army_Master
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content: 石砖，廉价且形状丰富

replies.author: CheatDiamond
replies.txt_content: 最好是无尽之块，实在不行中子碳素块也行（你问我材料怎么来，肝啊）

replies.author: thousand_shura
replies.txt_content: 石砖吧？我觉得

replies.author: thousand_shura
replies.txt_content: 半砖也不错

replies.author: 阿威23333
replies.txt_content: 除了房子以外喜欢自然环境，当然我是加了EWG才这么感觉的233

replies.author: tangxian
replies.txt_content: 尽然没砖石块？

replies.author: 尊主
replies.txt_content: 要看什么建筑和地形呀

replies.author: maxarise
replies.txt_content: 建议原石和苔石混合，有乡村气息

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
